name: RI_1_1_26_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Encryption_Event
title: RI.1.1.26.1 Evidence of Record Entry Encryption Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Encryption Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Encryption Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is encrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is encrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of encrypted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#04
statement.requirement: IF a user initiated a Record Entry content encryption, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user initiating Record Entry content encryption.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which encrypted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., encryption).

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is encrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is encrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#09
statement.requirement: IF a user initiated a Record Entry encryption, THEN the system MAY capture the rationale for encrypting Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture a sequence identifier for encrypted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the identifier and version of Encryption Tools used for each encrypted Record Entry.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture a reference (e.g., link, pointer) to pre-encrypted data for each Record Entry encryption.
